Interface HttpResponseFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyHttpResponseFactory, SimpleHttpResponseFactory
public interface HttpResponseFactory
A factory interface for creating MutableHttpResponse instances.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final HttpResponseFactory
    INSTANCE
    The default HttpResponseFactory instance.
